body: Hey I am ExoZombie_ i have recently joined the Avicus network and I must say, I am super impressed when it comes to the server and the community. I experience 0 lag on the server and everyone seems to be super nice! (The games are great to!) I am really hoping to grow in the community and maybe become staff someday! thanks for reading!       PS. If your team is recruiting I am avaible.
